articles.description: Ron and Joyce Bond have claimed the title of Britain's longest married couple after celebrating their 81st wedding anniversary on January 4. They married when Ron was 21 and Joyce was 19
articles.content:
Britain's longest married couple have celebrated their 81st wedding anniversary - after pals warned they "wouldn't last long".

articles.author: David Averre
articles.title: Walking Dead star criticizes says roles should not solely be given to actors with 'lived experience' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Lennie James, 56, said he would 'challenge' the idea that certain parts must be reserved for particular actors to ensure their performance is authentic because it would change the role of the actor.
articles.content: British actor and screenwriter Lennie James has questioned the notion that film roles should only be played by actors with lived experience and called for casting to be made on a 'case by case basis'… [+7720 chars]

articles.title: Maisie Smith shows off her natural beauty as she poses make-up free - Daily Mail
articles.description: The former EastEnders actress, 20, went make-up free as she shared pictures of her damp hair after a rehearsal session for the Strictly Come Dancing live tour.
articles.content:
Maisie Smith showed off her natural beauty on Wednesday as she took to Instagram to post a series of snaps.
